Once in the heart of the savannah, there lived a giraffe named Gigi who was born with a remarkably short neck. While her friends reached high to munch on treetop leaves, Gigi found herself nibbling on grass and wildflowers. At first, she felt left out, but one day, a fierce storm swept through, knocking down branches and creating a new food source at her level. Gigi thrived, while her tall friends struggled to adapt. Embracing her uniqueness, she became the savannahâ€™s best forager. Gigi taught everyone that sometimes, being different is the key to survival and success in a changing world.
